title: How much did it cost Motorola to develop the first cell phone? - Quora

response.answer_text: First, Motorola did not exactly develop the first cell phone. What they did do is develop the first practical handheld cell phone. The cost was probably not that much, certainly less than $100 million. That's because Motorola was also the largest supplier of both civilian and military radios, and so they had plenty of the technology already readily available. Here's a great article if you are  interested in the history of the cellular phone. This was originally published in Invention and Technology Magazine, now long gone. Page on privateline.com
